00007 addBranch_class::addBranch_class(void):
00008   scaler(NULL)
00009 {
00010 }

00012 addBranch_class::~addBranch_class(void){

00014 
00019 TTree *addBranch_class::AddBranch(TChain* originalChain, TString treename, TString BranchName, bool fastLoop, bool isMC){
00020   if(BranchName.Contains("invMassSigma")) return AddBranch_invMassSigma(originalChain, treename, BranchName, fastLoop);
00021   if(BranchName.CompareTo("iSM")==0)       return AddBranch_iSM(originalChain, treename, BranchName, fastLoop);
00022   if(BranchName.CompareTo("smearerCat")==0)       return AddBranch_smearerCat(originalChain, treename, isMC);
00023 
00024   std::cerr << "[ERROR] Request to add branch " << BranchName << " but not defined" << std::endl;
00025   return NULL;
00026 }
00027 
00028 TTree* addBranch_class::AddBranch_Pt(TChain* originalChain, TString treename){
00029   //sanity checks
00030 
00031   TTree* newtree = new TTree(treename, treename);
00032   //delete branches
00033   //TBranch *b = originalChain-> GetBranch("name of branch");
00034   //originalChain->GetListOfBranches()->Remove(b);
00035 
00036   //add pt branches
00037   Float_t         phiEle[2];
00038   Float_t         etaEle[2];
00039   Float_t         energyEle_regrCorr_fra[2];
00040   Float_t         energySCEle_regrCorr_ele[2];
00041   Float_t         energySCEle_regrCorr_pho[2];
00042   TBranch        *b_etaEle;   
00043   TBranch        *b_phiEle;   
00044   TBranch        *b_energySCEle_regrCorr_ele;   
00045   TBranch        *b_energySCEle_regrCorr_pho;   
00046   TBranch        *b_energyEle_regrCorr_fra;   
00047   originalChain->SetBranchAddress("etaEle", etaEle, &b_etaEle);
00048   originalChain->SetBranchAddress("phiEle", phiEle, &b_phiEle);
00049   originalChain->SetBranchAddress("energySCEle_regrCorr_ele", energySCEle_regrCorr_ele, &b_energySCEle_regrCorr_ele);
00050   originalChain->SetBranchAddress("energySCEle_regrCorr_pho", energySCEle_regrCorr_pho, &b_energySCEle_regrCorr_pho);
00051   originalChain->SetBranchAddress("energyEle_regrCorr_fra", energyEle_regrCorr_fra, &b_energyEle_regrCorr_fra);
00052 
00053   float ZPt_regrCorr_pho, ZPt_regrCorr_ele, ZPt_regrCorr_fra;
00054   newtree->Branch("ZPt_regrCorr_fra", &ZPt_regrCorr_fra, "ZPt_regrCorr_fra/F");
00055   newtree->Branch("ZPt_regrCorr_ele", &ZPt_regrCorr_ele, "ZPt_regrCorr_ele/F");
00056   newtree->Branch("ZPt_regrCorr_pho", &ZPt_regrCorr_pho, "ZPt_regrCorr_pho/F");
00057   //px = pt*cosphi; py = pt*sinphi; pz = pt*sinh(eta)
00058   //p^2 = E^2 - m^2 = pt^2*(1+sinh^2(eta)) = pt^2*(cosh^2(eta))
00059   float mass = 0.000511;
00060   for(Long64_t ientry = 0; ientry<originalChain->GetEntriesFast(); ientry++){
00061         originalChain->GetEntry(ientry);
00062         float regrCorr_fra_pt0 = sqrt((pow(energyEle_regrCorr_fra[0],2)-mass*mass)/(1+sinh(etaEle[0])*sinh(etaEle[0])));
00063         float regrCorr_fra_pt1 = sqrt((pow(energyEle_regrCorr_fra[1],2)-mass*mass)/(1+sinh(etaEle[1])*sinh(etaEle[1])));
00064         ZPt_regrCorr_fra = 
00065           TMath::Sqrt(pow(regrCorr_fra_pt0*TMath::Sin(phiEle[0])+regrCorr_fra_pt1*TMath::Sin(phiEle[1]),2)+pow(regrCorr_fra_pt0*TMath::Cos(phiEle[0])+regrCorr_fra_pt1*TMath::Cos(phiEle[1]),2));
00066 
00067         float regrCorr_ele_pt0 = sqrt((pow(energySCEle_regrCorr_ele[0],2)-mass*mass)/(1+sinh(etaEle[0])*sinh(etaEle[0])));
00068         float regrCorr_ele_pt1 = sqrt((pow(energySCEle_regrCorr_ele[1],2)-mass*mass)/(1+sinh(etaEle[1])*sinh(etaEle[1])));
00069         ZPt_regrCorr_ele = 
00070           TMath::Sqrt(pow(regrCorr_ele_pt0*TMath::Sin(phiEle[0])+regrCorr_ele_pt1*TMath::Sin(phiEle[1]),2)+pow(regrCorr_ele_pt0*TMath::Cos(phiEle[0])+regrCorr_ele_pt1*TMath::Cos(phiEle[1]),2));
00071 
00072         float regrCorr_pho_pt0 = sqrt((pow(energySCEle_regrCorr_pho[0],2)-mass*mass)/(1+sinh(etaEle[0])*sinh(etaEle[0])));
00073         float regrCorr_pho_pt1 = sqrt((pow(energySCEle_regrCorr_pho[1],2)-mass*mass)/(1+sinh(etaEle[1])*sinh(etaEle[1])));
00074         ZPt_regrCorr_pho = 
00075           TMath::Sqrt(pow(regrCorr_pho_pt0*TMath::Sin(phiEle[0])+regrCorr_pho_pt1*TMath::Sin(phiEle[1]),2)+pow(regrCorr_pho_pt0*TMath::Cos(phiEle[0])+regrCorr_pho_pt1*TMath::Cos(phiEle[1]),2));
00076         newtree->Fill();
00077   }
00078   originalChain->ResetBranchAddresses();
00079   return newtree;
00080 }

00082 
00083 TTree* addBranch_class::AddBranch_invMassSigma(TChain* originalChain, TString treename, TString invMassSigmaName, bool fastLoop){
00084   if(scaler==NULL) exit(1);
00085 
00086   //sanity checks
00087   TString etaEleBranchName="etaEle", phiEleBranchName="phiEle", etaSCEleBranchName="etaSCEle";
00088   TString R9EleBranchName="R9Ele";
00089   TString energyBranchName, invMassBranchName, sigmaEnergyBranchName;
00090 #ifndef NOFRIEND
00091   TTree *newtree = new TTree(treename, treename);
00092 #else 
00093   TTree *newtree = originalChain->CloneTree();
00094 #endif
00095   if(newtree==NULL){
00096     std::cerr << "[ERROR] New tree for branch " << invMassSigmaName << " is NULL" << std::endl;
00097     exit(1);
00098   }
00099   //delete branches
00100   //TBranch *b = originalChain-> GetBranch("name of branch");
00101   //originalChain->GetListOfBranches()->Remove(b);
00102 
00103   Int_t runNumber;
00104   //add pt branches
00105   Float_t         phiEle[2];
00106   Float_t         etaEle[2];
00107   Float_t         energyEle[2];
00108   Float_t         sigmaEnergyEle[2];
00109   Float_t         invMass;
00110   //Float_t         smearEle[2]={1,1};
00111   
00112   Float_t etaSCEle_[2];
00113   Float_t R9Ele_[2];
00114 
00115   //TBranch         *smearEle_b;
00116   if(invMassSigmaName=="invMassSigma_SC"){ 
00117     invMassBranchName="invMass_SC";
00118     energyBranchName="energySCEle";
00119     sigmaEnergyBranchName="";
00120     std::cerr << "[ERROR] No energy error estimation for std. SC" << std::endl;
00121     exit(1);
00122   } else if(invMassSigmaName=="invMassSigma_SC_regrCorr_ele"){
00123     invMassBranchName="invMass_SC_regrCorr_ele";
00124     energyBranchName="energySCEle_regrCorr_ele";
00125     sigmaEnergyBranchName="energySigmaSCEle_regrCorr_ele";
00126   } else if(invMassSigmaName=="invMassSigma_SC_regrCorr_pho"){ 
00127     energyBranchName="energySCEle_regrCorr_pho";
00128     invMassBranchName="invMass_SC_regrCorr_pho";
00129     sigmaEnergyBranchName="energySigmaSCEle_regrCorr_pho";    
00130   } else if(invMassSigmaName=="invMassSigma_regrCorr_fra"){
00131     invMassBranchName="invMass_regrCorr_fra";
00132     energyBranchName="energyEle_regrCorr_fra";
00133     sigmaEnergyBranchName="energysigmaEle_regrCorr_fra";    
00134   }
00135 
00136   if(fastLoop){
00137     originalChain->SetBranchStatus("*",0);
00138     originalChain->SetBranchStatus("runNumber",1);
00139     originalChain->SetBranchStatus(etaEleBranchName,1);
00140     originalChain->SetBranchStatus(etaSCEleBranchName,1);
00141     originalChain->SetBranchStatus(phiEleBranchName,1);
00142     originalChain->SetBranchStatus(etaSCEleBranchName,1);
00143     originalChain->SetBranchStatus(R9EleBranchName,1);
00144 
00145     //originalChain->SetBranchStatus(smearEleBranchName, true);
00146     originalChain->SetBranchStatus(energyBranchName,1);
00147     originalChain->SetBranchStatus(sigmaEnergyBranchName,1);
00148     originalChain->SetBranchStatus(invMassBranchName,1);
00149 
00150   }
00151   originalChain->SetBranchAddress("runNumber", &runNumber);
00152   if(originalChain->SetBranchAddress(etaEleBranchName, etaEle) < 0){
00153     std::cerr << "[ERROR] Branch etaEle not defined" << std::endl;
00154     exit(1);
00155   }
00156   if(originalChain->SetBranchAddress(phiEleBranchName, phiEle) < 0) exit(1);
00157   //if(originalChain->SetBranchAddress(smearEleBranchName, smearEle) < 0){
00158   //std::cerr << "[ERROR] Branch smearEle not defined" << std::endl;
00159   //exit(1);
00160   //}
00161   originalChain->SetBranchAddress(etaSCEleBranchName,etaSCEle_);
00162   originalChain->SetBranchAddress(R9EleBranchName, R9Ele_);
00163 
00164   if(originalChain->SetBranchAddress(energyBranchName, energyEle) < 0 ) exit(1);
00165   originalChain->SetBranchAddress(sigmaEnergyBranchName, sigmaEnergyEle);
00166   originalChain->SetBranchAddress(invMassBranchName, &invMass);
00167 
00168   Float_t invMassSigma;
00169   newtree->Branch(invMassSigmaName, &invMassSigma, invMassSigmaName+"/F");
00170 
00171   for(Long64_t ientry = 0; ientry<originalChain->GetEntriesFast(); ientry++){
00172 
00173     originalChain->GetEntry(ientry);
00174     float smearEle_[2];
00175     smearEle_[0] = scaler->getSmearingSigma(runNumber,energyEle[0], fabs(etaSCEle_[0]) < 1.4442, 
00176                                R9Ele_[0],etaEle[0]);
00177     smearEle_[1] = scaler->getSmearingSigma(runNumber,energyEle[1], fabs(etaSCEle_[1]) < 1.4442, 
00178                                R9Ele_[1],etaEle[1]);
00179 
00180     invMassSigma = 0.5 * invMass * sqrt( 
00181                                         sigmaEnergyEle[0]/energyEle[0] * sigmaEnergyEle[0]/energyEle[0] +
00182                                         sigmaEnergyEle[1]/energyEle[1] * sigmaEnergyEle[1]/energyEle[1] +
00183                                         smearEle_[0] * smearEle_[0] + smearEle_[1] * smearEle_[1]
00184                                         );
00185     newtree->Fill();
00186   }
00187 
00188   if(fastLoop)   originalChain->SetBranchStatus("*",1);
00189   originalChain->ResetBranchAddresses();
00190   return newtree;
00191 }

00194 
00195 TTree* addBranch_class::AddBranch_iSM(TChain* originalChain, TString treename, TString iSMEleName, bool fastLoop){
00196 
00197   TString seedXSCEleBranchName="seedXSCEle", seedYSCEleBranchName="seedYSCEle";
00198 
00199   TTree *newtree = new TTree(treename, treename);
00200 
00201   Float_t       seedXSCEle_[2];
00202   Float_t       seedYSCEle_[2];
00203   
00204 
00205   if(fastLoop){
00206     originalChain->SetBranchStatus("*",0);
00207     originalChain->SetBranchStatus(seedXSCEleBranchName,1);
00208     originalChain->SetBranchStatus(seedYSCEleBranchName,1);
00209   }
00210 
00211   if(originalChain->SetBranchAddress(seedXSCEleBranchName, seedXSCEle_) < 0){
00212     std::cerr << "[ERROR] Branch seedXSCEle not defined" << std::endl;
00213     exit(1);
00214   }
00215 
00216   if(originalChain->SetBranchAddress(seedYSCEleBranchName, seedYSCEle_) < 0){
00217     std::cerr << "[ERROR] Branch seedYSCEle not defined" << std::endl;
00218     exit(1);
00219   }
00220 
00221 
00222   Int_t iSM_[2];
00223   newtree->Branch(iSMEleName, iSM_, iSMEleName+"[2]/I");
00224 
00225   for(Long64_t ientry = 0; ientry<originalChain->GetEntriesFast(); ientry++){
00226     iSM_[0]=-1;
00227     iSM_[1]=-1;
00228     originalChain->GetEntry(ientry);
00229     if(seedXSCEle_[0]!=0){
00230       if(seedXSCEle_[0] > 0) {
00231         // EB+
00232         iSM_[0] = (int)((seedYSCEle_[0]-1))/20 + 1;
00233       } else {
00234         // EB-
00235         iSM_[0] = (int)((seedYSCEle_[0]-1))/20 + 19;
00236       }
00237     }
00238     
00239     if(seedYSCEle_[1] !=0){
00240       if(seedXSCEle_[1] > 0) {
00241         // EB+
00242         iSM_[1] = (int)((seedYSCEle_[1]-1))/20 + 1;
00243       } else {
00244       // EB-
00245         iSM_[1] = (int)((seedYSCEle_[1]-1))/20 + 19;
00246       }
00247     }
00248     if(ientry < 10) std::cout << seedXSCEle_[0] << "\t" << seedYSCEle_[0] << "\t" << iSM_[0] << std::endl;
00249     if(ientry < 10) std::cout << seedXSCEle_[1] << "\t" << seedYSCEle_[1] << "\t" << iSM_[1] << std::endl;
00250     if(seedXSCEle_[1] < 0 && iSM_[1] < 19) std::cout << seedXSCEle_[1] << "\t" << seedYSCEle_[1] << "\t" << iSM_[1] << std::endl;
00251     newtree->Fill();
00252   }
00253 
00254   if(fastLoop)   originalChain->SetBranchStatus("*",1);
00255   originalChain->ResetBranchAddresses();
00256   return newtree;
00257 }

00260 
00261 // branch with the smearing category index
00262 TTree* addBranch_class::AddBranch_smearerCat(TChain* originalChain, TString treename, bool isMC){
00263 
00264   ElectronCategory_class cutter;
00265   if(originalChain->GetBranch("scaleEle")!=NULL){
00266     cutter._corrEle=true;
00267     std::cout << "[INFO] Activating scaleEle for smearerCat" << std::endl;
00268     
00269   }
00270   TString oddString="";
00271 
00272   //setting the new tree
00273   TTree *newtree = new TTree(treename, treename);
00274   Int_t  smearerCat[2];
00275   Char_t cat1[10];
00276   sprintf(cat1,"XX");
00277   newtree->Branch("smearerCat", smearerCat, "smearerCat[2]/I");
00278   newtree->Branch("catName", cat1, "catName/C");
00279   //  newtree->Branch("catName2", cat2, "catName2/C");
00280   
00282   originalChain->SetBranchStatus("*",0);
00283   
00284   std::vector< std::pair<TTreeFormula*, TTreeFormula*> > catSelectors;
00285   for(std::vector<TString>::const_iterator region_ele1_itr = _regionList.begin();
00286       region_ele1_itr != _regionList.end();
00287       region_ele1_itr++){
00288 
00289     // \todo activating branches // not efficient in this loop
00290     std::set<TString> branchNames = cutter.GetBranchNameNtuple(*region_ele1_itr);
00291     for(std::set<TString>::const_iterator itr = branchNames.begin();
00292         itr != branchNames.end(); itr++){
00293       originalChain->SetBranchStatus(*itr, 1);
00294     }
00295     if(    cutter._corrEle==true) originalChain->SetBranchStatus("scaleEle", 1);
00296 
00297 
00298     for(std::vector<TString>::const_iterator region_ele2_itr = region_ele1_itr;
00299         region_ele2_itr != _regionList.end();
00300         region_ele2_itr++){
00301       
00302       if(region_ele2_itr==region_ele1_itr){
00303         TString region=*region_ele1_itr;
00304         region.ReplaceAll(_commonCut,""); //remove the common Cut!
00305         TTreeFormula *selector = new TTreeFormula("selector-"+(region), cutter.GetCut(region+oddString, isMC), originalChain);
00306         catSelectors.push_back(std::pair<TTreeFormula*, TTreeFormula*>(selector,NULL));
00307         //selector->Print();
00308         //std::cout << cutter.GetCut(region+oddString, isMC) << std::endl;
00309         //exit(0);
00310       } else {
00311         TString region1=*region_ele1_itr;
00312         TString region2=*region_ele2_itr;
00313         region1.ReplaceAll(_commonCut,"");
00314         region2.ReplaceAll(_commonCut,"");
00315         TTreeFormula *selector1 = new TTreeFormula("selector1-"+region1+region2, 
00316                                                    cutter.GetCut(region1+oddString, isMC, 1) && 
00317                                                    cutter.GetCut(region2+oddString, isMC, 2),
00318                                                    originalChain);
00319         TTreeFormula *selector2 = new TTreeFormula("selector2-"+region1+region2,
00320                                                    cutter.GetCut(region1+oddString, isMC, 2) && 
00321                                                    cutter.GetCut(region2+oddString, isMC, 1),
00322                                                    originalChain);
00323         catSelectors.push_back(std::pair<TTreeFormula*, TTreeFormula*>(selector1,selector2));
00324         //selector1->Print();
00325         //      selector2->Print();
00326         //exit(0);
00327       } 
00328         
00329     }
00330   }
00331 
00332 
00333   Long64_t entries = originalChain->GetEntries();
00334   originalChain->LoadTree(originalChain->GetEntryNumber(0));
00335   Long64_t treenumber=-1;
00336 
00337   std::cout << "[STATUS] Get smearerCat for tree: " << originalChain->GetTitle() 
00338             << "\t" << "with " << entries << " entries" << std::endl;
00339   std::cerr << "[00%]";
00340 
00341   for(Long64_t jentry=0; jentry < entries; jentry++){
00342     originalChain->GetEntry(jentry);
00343     if (originalChain->GetTreeNumber() != treenumber) {
00344       treenumber = originalChain->GetTreeNumber();
00345       for(std::vector< std::pair<TTreeFormula*, TTreeFormula*> >::const_iterator catSelector_itr = catSelectors.begin();
00346           catSelector_itr != catSelectors.end();
00347           catSelector_itr++){
00348         
00349         catSelector_itr->first->UpdateFormulaLeaves();
00350         if(catSelector_itr->second!=NULL)       catSelector_itr->second->UpdateFormulaLeaves();
00351       }
00352     }
00353 
00354     int evIndex=-1;
00355     bool _swap=false;
00356     for(std::vector< std::pair<TTreeFormula*, TTreeFormula*> >::const_iterator catSelector_itr = catSelectors.begin();
00357         catSelector_itr != catSelectors.end() && evIndex<0;
00358         catSelector_itr++){
00359       _swap=false;
00360       TTreeFormula *sel1 = catSelector_itr->first;
00361       TTreeFormula *sel2 = catSelector_itr->second;
00362       //if(sel1==NULL) continue; // is it possible?
00363       if(sel1->EvalInstance()==false){
00364         if(sel2==NULL || sel2->EvalInstance()==false) continue;
00365         else{
00366           _swap=true;
00367           //sprintf(cat1,"%s", sel2->GetName());
00368         }
00369       } //else sprintf(cat1,"%s", sel1->GetName());
00370       
00371       evIndex=catSelector_itr-catSelectors.begin();
00372     }
00373     
00374     smearerCat[0]=evIndex;
00375     smearerCat[1]=_swap ? 1 : 0;
00376     newtree->Fill();
00377     if(jentry%(entries/100)==0) std::cerr << "\b\b\b\b" << std::setw(2) << jentry/(entries/100) << "%]";
00378   }
00379   std::cout << std::endl;
00380 
00381   //if(fastLoop) 
00382   originalChain->SetBranchStatus("*",1);
00383   originalChain->ResetBranchAddresses();
00384   return newtree;
00385 }

00392 
00393 TTree *addBranch_class::GetTreeDistIEtaDistiPhi(TChain *tree,  bool fastLoop, int xDist, int yDist, TString iEtaBranchName, TString iPhiBranchName){
00394 
00395   
00396   Int_t iEta;
00397   Int_t iPhi;
00398   TTree *newTree = new TTree("distIEtaIPhi","");
00399   newTree->Branch("distIEta", &distIEta, "distIEta/I");
00400   newTree->Branch("distIPhi", &distIPhi, "distIPhi/I");
00401 
00402   if(fastLoop){
00403     tree->SetBranchStatus("*",0);
00404     tree->SetBranchStatus(iEtaBranchName,1);
00405     tree->SetBranchStatus(iPhiBranchName,1);
00406   }
00407 
00408   Int_t seedXSCEle[2];
00409   Int_t seedYSCEle[2];
00410   tree->SetBranchAddress(iEtaBranchName, seedXSCEle);
00411   tree->SetBranchAddress(iPhiBranchName, seedYSCEle);
00412 
00413   // loop over tree 
00414   for(Long64_t ientry = 0; ientry<tree->GetEntriesFast(); ientry++){
00415     tree->GetEntry(ientry);
00416     weight = GetWeight((int)nPU[0]); //only intime pu
00417     newTree->Fill();
00418   }
00419 
00420   
00421   if(fastLoop) tree->SetBranchStatus("*",1);
00422   tree->ResetBranchAddresses();
00423   std::cout << "[WARNING] nPU > nPU max for " << warningCounter << " times" << std::endl;
00424   return newTree;
00425 }
